variables:
int x = 5, y = 15;
printf("Sum = %d", x + y);
condition:
int a = 10;
if(a > 5){ printf("Greater than 5"); } else { printf("5 or less"); }

int n = 3;
switch(n){ case 1: printf("One"); break; case 2: printf("Two"); break; default: printf("Other"); }

int age = 18;
if(age >= 18) printf("Adult"); else printf("Minor");

int num = -5;
if(num < 0) printf("Negative"); else printf("Positive");

int score = 85;
if(score >= 90) printf("A"); else if(score >= 75) printf("B"); else printf("C");
loop_for: for(int i=1;i<=5;i++){ for(int j=1;j<=i;j++) printf("*"); printf("\n"); }

int arr[5]={1,2,3,4,5};
for(int i=0;i<5;i++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);
loop_while:
int i=0;
while(i<5){ printf("%d\n", i); i++; }

int n=5;
while(n>0){ printf("%d ", n); n--; }
loop_do_while:
int i=0;
do{ printf("%d\n", i); i++; }while(i<5);

int i=5;
do{ printf("%d ", i); i--; }while(i>0);
array:
int arr[5] = {1,2,3,4,5};
for(int i=0;i<5;i++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);

int arr[3]; arr[0]=10; arr[1]=20; arr[2]=30;
for(int i=0;i<3;i++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);

int arr[5]={0}; for(int i=0;i<5;i++) arr[i]=i+1;
for(int i=0;i<5;i++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);
int arr[]={5,4,3,2,1}; for(int i=0;i<5;i++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);
int arr[6]={1,2,3,4,5,6}; for(int i=0;i<6;i++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);
string:
char s[10]; scanf("%s", s);
printf("Input: %s", s);
structure:
struct Student { char name[20]; int age; } s1={"Bob",20};
printf("%s %d", s1.name,s1.age);

struct Rectangle { int length; int width; } r={5,10};
printf("Area=%d", r.length*r.width);

struct Circle { float radius; } c={7.5};
printf("Radius=%f", c.radius);

struct Point { int x,y; } p; p.x=1; p.y=2;
printf("%d %d", p.x,p.y);
function:
int sum(int a,int b){ return a+b; }
printf("%d", sum(3,4));

void greet(){ printf("Hello World\n"); }
greet();

int multiply(int x,int y){ return x*y; }
printf("%d", multiply(5,6));

float area(float r){ return 3.14*r*r; }
printf("%f", area(5));

int max(int a,int b){ return (a>b)?a:b; }
printf("%d", max(4,7));

int num=-5; if(num<0) cout<<"Neg"; else cout<<"Pos";
int score=85; if(score>=90) cout<<"A"; else if(score>=75) cout<<"B"; else cout<<"C";

for(int i=1;i<=5;i++){ for(int j=1;j<=i;j++) cout << '*'; cout << endl; }

loop_do_while: int sum=0,n=1; do{ sum+=n; n++; }while(n<=10); cout<<sum;

condition: let x=10; if(x>5){ console.log('Greater'); } else { console.log('Smaller'); }
let n=2; switch(n){ case 1: console.log(1); break; case 2: console.log(2); break; default: console.log(0); }
let age=18; console.log(age>=18?'Adult':'Minor');
let num=-5; console.log(num<0?'Negative':'Positive');
let score=85; if(score>=90) console.log('A'); else if(score>=75) console.log('B'); else console.log('C');

for(let i=1;i<=5;i++){ let s=''; for(let j=1;j<=i;j++) s+='*'; console.log(s); }
loop_while: let sum=0, i=1; while(i<=10){ sum+=i; i++; } console.log(sum);
loop_do_while: let i=0; do{ console.log(i); i++; } while(i<5);
let sum=0, n=1; do{ sum+=n; n++; }while(n<=10); console.log(sum);

let student={name:'Bob',age:20}; console.log(student.name,student.age);

let circle={radius:7.5}; console.log(circle.radius);
let p={x:1,y:2}; console.log(p.x,p.y);

variables: int a = 10; double b = 3.5; char c='A'; System.out.println(a+" "+b+" "+c);
condition: int x=10; if(x>5) System.out.println("Greater"); else System.out.println("Smaller");
int n=2; switch(n){ case 1:System.out.println(1); break; case 2:System.out.println(2); break; default:System.out.println(0); }
int age=18; System.out.println(age>=18?"Adult":"Minor");
int num=-5; System.out.println(num<0?"Negative":"Positive");
int score=85; if(score>=90) System.out.println('A'); else if(score>=75) System.out.println('B'); else System.out.println('C');
loop_for: int sum=0; for(int i=1;i<=10;i++) sum+=i; System.out.println(sum);
for(int i=1;i<=5;i++){ for(int j=1;j<=i;j++) System.out.print('*'); System.out.println(); }
loop_while: int sum=0,i=1; while(i<=10){ sum+=i; i++; } System.out.println(sum);
loop_do_while: int sum=0,i=1; do{ sum+=i; i++; }while(i<=10); System.out.println(sum);
array: int[] arr={1,2,3,4,5}; for(int i:arr) System.out.println(i);
int[] arr=new int[3]; arr[0]=10; arr[1]=20; arr[2]=30; for(int i:arr) System.out.println(i);
int[] arr=new int[5]; for(int i=0;i<5;i++) arr[i]=i+1; for(int i:arr) System.out.println(i);
int[] arr={5,4,3,2,1}; for(int i:arr) System.out.println(i);
int[] arr={1,2,3,4,5,6}; for(int i:arr) System.out.println(i);
structure: class Point{ int x,y; } Point p=new Point(); p.x=10; p.y=20; System.out.println(p.x+" "+p.y);

class Rect{ int l,w; } Rect r=new Rect(); r.l=5; r.w=10; System.out.println(r.l*r.w);
class Circle{ float radius; } Circle c=new Circle(); c.radius=7.5f; System.out.println(c.radius);
class Point2{ int x,y; } Point2 p1=new Point2(); p1.x=1; p1.y=2; System.out.println(p1.x+" "+p1.y);
function: int sum(int a,int b){ return a+b; } System.out.println(sum(3,4));
void greet(){ System.out.println("Hello"); } greet();
int multiply(int x,int y){ return x*y; } System.out.println(multiply(5,6));
